name: The Fain Maiden: Journeys of a Weary Vessel Athwart the Crypts of Yeowel for Spite and Vengeance
name_original: The Fain Maiden: Journeys of a Weary Vessel Athwart the Crypts of Yeowel for Spite and Vengeance
description:
The lich has cursed you to die. You cannot break the curse, but you can delay it. So why not use the extra time to take him with you?

Game by Ben Walter

Art by SalamiChild and CrowBow

Music by Jose Ramon 'Bibiki' Garcia
